title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Fry bacon with garlic and jalapeños. Whisk eggs with parmesan. Mix hot pasta with bacon mixture, remove from heat, add egg-cheese mixture, and stir quickly to coat. Garnish with fresh coriander and serve warm.

title: rice with fish-curry
instructions: Heat mustard oil, fry mustard seeds and onions, add ginger-garlic paste and spices. Add fish and cook gently. Prepare rice separately. Serve the fish curry hot over rice, garnished with coriander leaves.

title: fish platter
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and chili powder. Fry onions and mustard seeds in mustard oil. Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté. Cook rice separately. Combine fried fish with cooked rice and garnish with fresh coriander before serving.

title: mutton khichuri
instructions: Heat mustard oil, sauté onions, ginger-garlic paste, and spices. Add mutton pieces and cook until browned. Add washed rice and lentils, stir, then add water and cook until rice and meat are tender. Garnish with boiled eggs and serve hot.

title: French Croissant
instructions: Prepare yeast dough, fold with butter layers, shape into croissants, proof, brush with egg wash, and bake until golden.

title: Italian veg salad
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces, mix in a large bowl, drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, season with salt and black pepper, and garnish with fresh basil before serving.
